title: 1 on 1 Soccer
description:
Don't you enjoy the straight-forward athletic duels on the field? In 1 on 1 Soccer, you get to face off against another player (Computer or real) in a 2 player football match. Run up against the ball to kick it across the field. Jump up in the air to move the ball with your head, or to simply stand on your opponent's. A match only lasts five minutes. Before you know it, you're itching for a rematch.

The easy gameplay makes this soccer match fun and addictive. Grab your best friend and play a duell to find out who can handle the ball better. Aim into your opponent's goal and try to keep it as far away as possible from your own. What are you waiting for? Have some sporty fun with those funny looking figures in 1 on 1 Soccer, online and for free on Silvergames.com!

Controls: WASD / Arrows = Move/Jump

title: A Fancy Pants Adventure
description: In this game you take control of Fancy Pants - a cool stickman character who wears awesome and colorful pants! You must help our fancy hero work his way through a myriad of cool levels and avoid various obstacles, monsters and creatures on his way!

title: Alien Hominid
description: Your UFO has crash landed, and the FBI is out to get you! Time to take them out!
author: Tom Fulp

title: Chrome Dinosaur
author: Google
description: The Dinosaur Game is a browser game developed by Google and built into the Google Chrome web browser. The player guides a pixelated Tyrannosaurus rex across a side-scrolling landscape, avoiding obstacles to achieve a higher score.

title: Fireboy & Watergirl Into the Forest Temple
